Name: Fantasya
About the game: Planet Eaters threaten the galaxy by eating planets. Planet Eater, which threatens the galaxy, is currently encroaching on the planet Fantasya to eat it. Knowing this, the planetary protection agency Ndev dispatches Captain Mr.Bae, a specialized Planet Eater disposal team, to save the planet Fantasya. Help Mr.Bae save the planet Fantasya. ■ Please level up and grow your crew members through the experience gained from clearing the stage. ■ A special container [Pandora] made to contain Planet Eaters can grant special powers to crew members. ■ Feel free to change the skills of the members according to the situation of each stage. Save the planet Fantasya from the Planet Eaters and keep the peace in the galaxy!
